text: allh subhanah wteala yakhtar min almalayikat rusulana 'iilaa anbyayh, wayakhtar min alnaas rusulana ltblygh rsalath 'iilaa alkhlq, 'iina allah samie laqwal ebadh, basir bjmye alashya', wabiman ykhtarh llrsalt min khlqh. wahu subhanah yaelam ma bayn 'aydi mlaykth warusulih min qabl 'an ykhlqhm, wayaelam ma hu kayn baed fnayhm. wa'iilaa allah wahdah tarjie alamwr
